source_name: Estimation of Bottom Trawl Catch Efficiency for Two Demersal Fishes, the Atlantic Croaker and White Perch, in Chesapeake Bay
source_documentation: Research-scale trawl characterization in traditionally high-capture Chesapeake Bay

effort_models.name: Fishing hours - Landed catch - Chesapeake small scale trawl
effort_models.documentation:
Hoffman 2009 [DOI: 10.1577/C08-048.1] 19.8m vessel, 680kW engine [**probably not operated at high capacity**]
20-minute trawls 784 +- 422 kg croaker; 484 +- 228 kg white perch
 1.75-2.3 t / h => 680 / (1.75-2.3) kWh/t
